name: Baby Hazel Spa Bath
description:
Kids can play Baby Hazel Spa Bath game for free.

Wow! It is Spa time! Here you get a chance to make Baby Hazel happy by giving her a Spa Bath. But as a first thing let us pick the ingredients from kitchen and prepare different flavors of bath mix . Then, rejuvenate Baby Hazel's skin cells by giving her different flavored baths. Keep Hazel's spa bath relaxing and enjoyable by fulfilling her needs on time. Happy Spa time with Baby Hazel!
